name: Strawberry Summer
author: Melissa Brayden
note: Really nice romantic story. I actually only realized part-way that this was my second time reading it, but it was a nice novel to re-read anyway.

name: The Weakest Tamer Began a Journey to Pick Up Trash Vol. 1
author: Honobonoru500
note: A cute healing story about a little girl who runs away from her abusive village and disovers the rest of the world. Not an isekai, for the most part.

name: Kuma Kuma Bear S2
note: Another pretty good season of one of my favorite light novel series. They didn't quite get the awesomeness of the fight scene in the final episode, though.

name: Skip to Loafer
note: A fun slice of life anime with a really fun protagonist. All in all, a really enjoyable heartwarming story.
